message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.CY, cs.SD

This paper discusses the problem of fake news and its spread in social networks, which falls under the category of natural language processing and computational linguistics (cs.CL). The study also involves analyzing the language and style of articles, which could be related to information retrieval (cs.IR) and social network analysis (cs.SI). The use of heuristics in persuasion could be related to cybersecurity (cs.CY) and the mental associations between entities and claims could be related to semantic web (cs.SD).
